title: Flight Simulator 2020 - How to - Fenix Simulations A320 - sending flight delay messages
description:
In this video we will look at the feature to send delay messages. This feature is unique because I haven't seen it in other aircrafts in MSFS yet. Using this feature you can inform your company about any delays and the reason why the flight is delayed.
